alert.note: Alert for Atchison; Doniphan; Leavenworth (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 04 at 11:20PM CDT until July 05 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pleasant Hill has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Doniphan County in northeastern Kansas... Northwestern Leavenworth County in northeastern Kansas... Atchison County in northeastern Kansas... Southwestern Buchanan County in northwestern Missouri... Northwestern Platte County in west central Missouri... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1120 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Denton to near Nortonville to near Meriden, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Atchison, Effingham, Rushville, Lancaster, Easton, Lewis And Clark Village, Doniphan, De Kalb, Farmington, Huron, Iatan, Bean Lake, Lewis And Clark Vi, Lowemont, Cummings and Potter. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
